definition[0]: if part of your body is itchy, it feels slightly unpleasant and you want to rub it with your nails
example[0]: My eyes sometimes get red and itchy in the summer.
definition[1]: if clothes are itchy, they make your skin feel slightly unpleasant, so that you want to rub your skin with your nails
definition[2]: wanting to go somewhere new or do something different
example[3]: He’s had that job now for about eight years, and he’s starting to get itchy.
example[4]: I’ve only been back home for a few months and I’ve already got itchy feet  (=the desire to go somewhere new).
